vote.title: Appointment of Sheldon A. Goodrum, Domestic Relations Attorney, Grossman Law Offices, 32 W. Hoster Street, Suite 100, Columbus, OH 43215, to serve on the Scioto Peninsula New Community Authority Board of Trustees as a citizen member replacing Jason Jenkins, with a term expiration date of September 16, 2027, but shall continue to hold over into one or more subsequent terms until a new citizen member is duly appointed or elected to serve for the remainder of such term. (resume attached).

Title

Appointment of Sheldon A. Goodrum, Domestic Relations Attorney, Grossman Law Offices, 32 W. Hoster Street, Suite 100, Columbus, OH 43215, to serve on the Scioto Peninsula New Community Authority Board of Trustees as a citizen member replacing Jason Jenkins, with a term expiration date of September 16, 2027, but shall continue to hold over into one or more subsequent terms until a new citizen member is duly appointed or elected to serve for the remainder of such term. (resume attached).
